txt.en: Freeing the Folk
You should free the captive inhabitants of Torsbury.
While scouting Torsbury, you discovered that the Dunlendings are holding several inhabitants captive. You should free the captive inhabitants of Torsbury.
Captives can be found throughout the enemy camp at Torsbury.\n\nYou should free the captive inhabitants of Torsbury.
Freed Béowald
Freed Aswald
'You found captives and did not free them all?'
Freed Ethelflad
Free Cynegyth
Free Aldúlf
Thane Tordag is at his encampment, north of the road between Torsbury and Stoke.\n\nYou should return to Thane Tordag and let him know that you have rescued some of his people.
Free the captives
Free Béowald
'Aye, the poor sods have found their way here. I must thank you for freeing them! They suffered much at the hands of those barbarians. . . .'
While scouting Torsbury, you discovered that the Dunlendings are holding several inhabitants captive.
Talk to Thane Tordag at his encampment
Freed Cynegyth
TBD
Freed Aldúlf
Free Aswald
'I am grateful, my friend. These Dunlendings are barbarians!'
Free Ethelflad
'I can find my own way to the Thane's camp! Be careful...there are powerful men from different clans here....'
'You are a sight for sore eyes! I have seen the markings of the Dragon and Ox Clans here...warn Thane Tordag!'
'These men frighten me! They dress like stags and falcons....'
You should free the captive inhabitants of Torsbury
'My thanks! You must warn Thane Tordag...the Dunlendings have united beneath the banner of the White Hand. There are ambassadors from four of the clans in this camp!'
